name: Pac-Man Remake
description:
Damn! Pac-Man be looking kinda spooky.

It's Pac-Man, but scary! 

We've got split-screen multiplayer, online leaderboards, and only slightly buggy AI. Enjoy!

Credits:

Production and Audio by Kaijie "Jacky" Wen

Art by Kayla Jung 

Programmed by Daniel Silverstein (TheLettuceClub) and Declan Scott (datoneguy246) 

Pac-Man is a registered trademark of BANDAI NAMCO ENTERTAINMENT INC and we obviously make no claim of ownership.
